metadata.title: CVE-2024-27422 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netrom: Fix a data-race around sysctl_netrom_transport_no_activity_timeoutWe need to protect the reader reading the sysctl value because thevalue can be changed concurrently.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
